# Anton Sten Product Designer

> Anton Sten is a Senior Product Designer with over 25 years of experience crafting user-centered digital products for startups and enterprises alike. His work spans comprehensive UX strategy, design systems, and hands-on interface design, with a passion for bridging business goals and user needs to deliver impactful, intuitive experiences.

## Professional Background

- **Role**: Senior Product Designer & UX Lead
- **Experience**: 25+ years in digital product design
- **Focus Areas**: UX Strategy, Design Systems, Interface Design, User Research
- **Industry Expertise**: Startups, Enterprise, SaaS, E-commerce, Mobile Apps
- **Location**: Sweden (Swedish designer with international experience)

## Core Competencies

- User Experience (UX) Design & Strategy
- User Interface (UI) Design
- Design Systems & Component Libraries
- User Research & Usability Testing
- Product Strategy & Business Alignment
- Design Leadership & Team Management
- Freelance & Consulting
- Design Education & Mentoring

## Key Topics & Expertise Areas

- **UX Strategy**: Comprehensive approaches to user experience planning
- **Design Leadership**: Leading design teams and processes
- **AI & Ethics**: Ethical considerations in AI-powered design
- **Stakeholder Management**: Working with business stakeholders
- **Freelance Design**: Independent design consulting and business
- **Future of Design**: Emerging trends and technologies
- **Design Education**: Teaching and mentoring designers
- **Design Writing**: Communication and documentation in design

## Design Philosophy & Approach

- User-centered design methodology
- Data-driven decision making
- Business and user needs alignment
- Iterative design processes
- Accessibility and inclusive design
- Performance and usability optimization
- Cross-functional collaboration
- Continuous learning and adaptation

## Industry Recognition

- Featured speaker at design conferences
- Published author on design topics
- Mentor to emerging designers
- Trusted advisor to startups and enterprises
- Regular contributor to design community discussions

- **Coaching**: One-on-one design mentorship
